title: 1.9命令方块 tellraw 怎么弄点击事件打开网址？
author: maps_of_China

replies.author: 爱心魔王FHC
replies.txt_content:
FHC红石 发表于 2016-5-22 16:33
同理啊……都加上双引号
/tellraw @p {"text":"XXX","underlined":"true","clickEvent":{"action:open_ur ...
/tellraw @p {"text":"XXX","underlined":"true","clickEvent":{"action":"open_url","value":"http://www.XXX"}}

上面双引号写漏了

replies.author: 爱心魔王FHC
replies.txt_content:
其实1.9只要在每个json上加上引号就好，比如
/tellraw @p {"text":"XXX","clickEvent":{"action":"suggest_command","value":"xxx"}}

replies.author: maps_of_China
replies.txt_content:
FHC红石 发表于 2016-5-22 14:05
其实1.9只要在每个json上加上引号就好，比如
/tellraw @p {"text":"XXX","clickEvent":{"action":"suggest_ ...
有没有打开网址的？

replies.author: 爱心魔王FHC
replies.txt_content:
maps_of_China 发表于 2016-5-22 16:25
有没有打开网址的？
同理啊……都加上双引号
/tellraw @p {"text":"XXX","underlined":"true","clickEvent":{"action:open_url","value":"http://www.XXX"}}
